Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Alongside \A*long"side`\, adv. Along or by the side; side by side with; -- often with of; as, bring the boat alongside; alongside of him; alongside of the tree. [1913 Webster]
alongside adv : side by side; "anchored close aboard another ship" [syn: {aboard}]
